name: Dragon's Blood Candle
description:
Dragonâ€™s blood, derived from the red resin of the Dracaena tree. Used in ancient times as a varnish, medicine and incense. Fragrance composed with notes of amber, incense, a touch of patchouli and a hint of citrus.

180 gram/8oz fragranced soy candle with a cotton wick

name: Darkened Forest Perfume Oil
description:
The Black Forests of Germany, dense growths of conifer perpetually blocking the suns rays. A deep rich-green-herbal blend, with notes of rippend red fruits with a hint of sweet forest berries.

Amber glass vial with black cap
5ml perfume oil
The listing is for one bottle

Usage Instructions: 
To use, apply a few drops to pulse points like wrist and behind the ears. Re-apply as often as required. A few drops can also be added to unscented body oil or moisturiser.

Recommendations:
Patch test before use and if any irritation occurs discontinue immediately. 
Store in a cool dark place out of direct sunlight. 
May stain some fabrics.
